magpie.csp

Class DMSPEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.csp.CSPEngine
      • magpie.csp.DMSPEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commandable, Options, Printable

    public class DMSPEngine
extends CSPEngine
    Data-Mining Structure Predictor (DMSP) from Fisher et al.

    Usage: *No options*

    Method: Uses strategy described in PhaseDiagramStatistics to calculate probabilities of each prototype appearing at a certain composition. Using the notation from the that documentation, the goal is to calculate:

    P(Cj = y | C1 = a1 ∩ ... ∩ Cj-1 = aj-1 ∩ Cj+1 = aj+1 ∩ ... ∩ EN = ZN)

    • Field Summary
